name: built-in-element
description: A polyfill for Custom Element built-in

scripts.build: npm run min && npm run es5 && npm run size && npm run test
scripts.es5: cp index.js tmp.js && cat test/my-button.js >> tmp.js && cat tmp.js | babel --no-babelrc --presets=@babel/env > test/es5/index.js && rm tmp.js && npm run min5
scripts.size: cat index.js | wc -c;cat min.js | wc -c;gzip -c9 min.js | wc -c;cat min.js | brotli | wc -c && rm -f min.js.br
scripts.test: npm run server & (sleep 1 && npm run nightmare && npm run kill)

author: Andrea Giammarchi
